website_summaries.verdict: This handy bait station offers safety for pets and children while providing protection from mice and rats.
pros: Can be secured onto wall or other structure to prevent station from moving
Can be used indoors or out
cons: One of the keys arrives inside the station, making retrieval problematic

customer_reviews.title: Good bait box, but racoons can get to bait with arms.
customer_reviews.text: I set up a game camera to watch the 2 I bought. Rats definitely going in and out, but also racoons were attracted. I drilled holes in box bottom and tied string to them, good thing, racoon would've taken the box. Watched one racoon work the boxes for 30 minutes one night. He couldn't open them, but saw him reach way in and break off bait chunks and eat it. So, some dead rats and at least one dead racoon out there somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: works just as i expected
customer_reviews.text: While this is not a commercial grade unit at all, it is just fine for residential use. Mine only came with one key, but it works just fine. Comes with small stakes to hold it down, no directions, so I put them in the big end holes. Easy to load with bait. Holds one packet if you buy the bucket of packets. I guess the kids could shake it and the bait would come out, so be aware of that.
customer_reviews.author: Carl P

customer_reviews.title: Effective for rat control
customer_reviews.text: I have a small grove in Vista, CA. and a rental in La Quinta, both have problems with rats off and on (mostly going after avocados in Vista, and living in the palms in La Quinta). Effective easy to use solution for control. Poisoned rats can be a danger to birds, so I try and place these near where I think the rats nest is, which is generally in a place that birds cannot get to. Also, its trivial to check the traps and I find that once the rats in an area are gone they may not make it back for many months at a time depending on time of year.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Decent bait station but using the key on two locks is a pain
customer_reviews.text: Nice enough, but if you have no kids the double key locks are a pain to have to use to rebait. And I’ll probably lose the key sooner or later and have to throw away the whole station and buy some other keyless model. I found what I think is by far the best station online called “Vole Control bait stations”, They are SO much easier to check and add bait to. These box type ststions are more difficult to open after dirt and debris settles in to the lid snap locks. The Vole Control easily unscrews and they are made specifically for voles, preventing squirrels and chipmunks from being killed, which is a good thing. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: SNBow

customer_reviews.title: Very secure bait station
customer_reviews.text: Opening the bait station is not easy with the "key". However, it does make it very secure which I consider a good thing considering the poison rat bait being used. Prevents animals, birds, etc. from being harmed.
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: Do it yourself exterminating
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Had a rat in my car 🤮 placed this next to my trash receptacle and it's doing its job perfectly. I have contacted an exterminator and this is the exact thing they were going to try and sell me for double the price along with $1 wooden traps decided to get the job done myself. If you have pets and kids and a rodent problem this is great because it locks and they cant reach in to grab the baits.
customer_reviews.author: VetWife

customer_reviews.title: Will only the rat get sick?
customer_reviews.text: This product came without instructions. It shows a yellow key in picture, which though I have no idea why it is there, the product came without the key. I don't know if the poison is active or inactive. I assume the key has something to do with operation. It is ridiculous to have a poison shipped without instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Mesh

customer_reviews.title: huge
customer_reviews.text: You can dish out a lot of poison with this thing. It's pretty large, which I like, and the quality is high. I only gave 4 stars because it was shipped to me with only 1 key to open it. I can still get it open, but its more difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: too small
customer_reviews.text: they don't give you the dimensions and what you receive is a trap much smaller than the other two I purchased elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best app to shop at!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent size and description was accurate. Shipping was fast which for this product I was very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time and came with bait. Provided key opens box with ease. Has secure close. Simple to load. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Msallen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Out of the 7 I got, 1 is difficult to latch closed
customer_reviews.author: robert hulcher

customer_reviews.title: Returned, One Key Short
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this first Station as it came with only one key when two are required.
customer_reviews.author: Marlin

customer_reviews.title: ease of use.
customer_reviews.text: you can't see the bait and two keys is poor design. hard to open.
customer_reviews.author: Donald S.

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted! Thank you for shipping it fast!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid box. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: It would be nice to have a place to clip in the key that unlocks it.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Baumgartner

customer_reviews.title: My station only came with a single key. I ...
customer_reviews.text: My station only came with a single key. I can still make it work but it is frustrating to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Rat Bait Station Rodent Bait Station with Key Eliminates Rats and Mice Fast. Keeps Children and Pets Safe (1 Pack)
feature_bullets: Tamper resistant- dedicated double key system ideal for perimeter baiting, can be attached to a permanent structure for added security.
Easy Installation - Durable design for both indoor and outdoor.
Pet Friendly - Lock-able station is safe for pets and non target species.
Universal - For use of any type of rodent bait, including bait blocks.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars71 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
